article_title: House Republicans Should Break The Obamacare Mold On Doctor Pay

article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb

og.description: The Republican leadership on Capitol Hill is negotiating with House Democrats over a permanent fix to the way Medicare pays physicians. If this “doc fix” passes in its current form, it will represent a profound and enduring triumph of Obamacare’s creeping regulation of the American practice of medicine. Congress has an [...]
